snippet: Prepared opening statements of two senior State Department officials and two members of the security team involved in the attack last month at the American diplomatic mission in Benghazi, Libya, that killed the American ambassador and three other...
lead_paragraph: Prepared opening statements of two senior State Department officials and two members of the security team involved in the attack last month at the American diplomatic mission in Benghazi, Libya, that killed the American ambassador and three other Americans.

headline.main: Prepared Statements on the Attack in Benghazi, Libya
